title: Didnt get a free win for promos to gold?
body: Recently reached promos to gold 5 lost then received the message that next time I reached them I would be granted a free win. I ended up qualifying for the series again, but was not awarded one. Does the promo helper not apply in tier promotions?

replies.body: You do have that free win, but it looks like you've only won 2 matches including the free win so far. Keep in mind that since you're moving from Silver 1 to Gold 5 you need to win [**3 out of 5 matches**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204010760) instead of the usual 2 out of 3. Moving up Tiers requires winning the majority of 5 matches.

Hello thank you for your reply.
I currently am showing 1 win 1 loss on my account, the win was an Amumu jungle game played on 30/06/17

[Profile Screenshot](https://gyazo.com/a40450f00d941dabd05fbf6a8c0a6e46)
